column2: Tindak Malaysia (2024), Penyata Pilihanraya umum Dewan Undangan Negeri Kelantan, 1978 by Election Commission (SPR),Government Gazettes of 9/3/1978 and 6/4/1978

There are missing gaps for candidate age data. Refer to Section of Candidate Name Discrepancy for multiple names for the candidates. EC's Publication wrongly attributed of Independent candidate losing deposit for DUN Bukit Panau when there was no independent candidate was contesting. Refer to KELANTAN_1978_DUN_CANDIDATE_AGE_SOURCE for candidate age source data.  EC Publication missed out in listing Berjasa candidate losing deposit in Lanas. TindakMalaysia Network Services PLT is not responsible for any errors or omissions arising from the original data or its derivatives
Composite between Parliamentary Code and DUN Code (Unique Identifier)
Party/Coalition (with Component Party) who won the seat
Indicator if there was one contestant for the said election. If yes, value Y is affixed. If none, it is left blank
Total Elector count using 1976/77 Electoral Roll that was certified on 13th February 1977
The difference between the highest valid votes and second highest valid votes
Proportion of Total Ballots Issued as a share of Total Electorate
Total number of ballot papers issued at the poll
Total number of ballot papers issued but not put in the ballot box (no information is available)
Total number of rejected ballot papers
Total number of votes by electors
Barisan Nasional Candidate Name as per the Government Gazette
Barisan Nasional Valid Vote for the Candidate
Indicated if the contestant has lost deposit. If yes, value 'Lost Deposit' is affixed. If none, it is left blank
